extDescription.message: Release Memory of Tab on regular basis.

setTimerTitle.message: Time to unload of inactive tab

warning_blankPage.message:
The linked page and it is not empty and does not have any effect.
Also, the pause is not canceled even if you select the tab after you update the extension has been released. Please come back 'Back' button.

warning_extPage.message:
If you enable the "Page in the extensions", tabs that are released when the Reload extension updates will be closed. This is the specification of Chrome.
In this feature is enabled, if the update had been done, if you choose to restore from an icon in the Toolbar's advanced features, you can re-open the tab before the update.

exclude_url.message: Exclude URL(Partial matches, Regular expression, Not required escape)
